-e ---

# 𒍘 UŠUM USHUM UŠUMX USHUMX

𒍘 𒈮𒁁 mug.bad ≈ muš

𒍘 ≈ 𒀴

𒍘 ≠ 𒋾 𒆰 𒁄

𒍘 serpent

𒍘 UŠUM 𒀸𒌇𒍗 (𒀸 aš 𒌇 du 𒍗 uš ma )

𒍘 USHUM "dragon" 𒌋𒋳 𒃲𒇻 ᵍu-šum-gal-lu | 𒈲𒄭𒄊𒋗 muš-ḫuš-šu 𒆗𒆳𒊭𒈦 kal-lat ša-maš "dragonfly"

𒍘 dun5 𒍘𒈾 dun5-na "humble" Akk. wašru

𒍘𒈾 dun down to earth, 𐌷𐌰𐌿𐌽𐍃 de'hauns demütig ydmyk ma.down مُتَوَاضِع‎ mutawāḍiʕ

𒍘 dun₅ ≈ 𒁲 DI 𒁺 du in drehn turn churn "to roam around; to rock, churn"
